archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.1.9d: d) used to demonstrate adherence to internal policies (e.g. the organisation's information security policy) and compliance with external standards and legal/regulatory requirements (e.g. ISO/IEC 27001, PCI DSS, NIST Cybersecurity Framework and IEC 62443).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
